structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: "Owner" as used in KRS 99.220 to 99.240, includes a person having an estate, interest, or easement in the real property to be acquired or a lien, charge, or encumbrance thereon.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 185, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 82. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 36, secs. 2 and 14.
